comments:
Build ID:  I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Create a new Project Template
2.In property-group change the type to PAGES_TAB/PAGES_ONLY (as mentioned in the Project Template Engine help)
3.Run the plugin with this updated Template.
4.Page is not displayed in wizard and following error is logged in the log
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2007-08-09 12:10:23.346
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
               at org.eclipse.cdt.ui.templateengine.pages.UIPagesProvider.getWizardUIPages(UIPagesProvider.java:75)
               at org.eclipse.cdt.ui.templateengine.Template.getUIPages(Template.java:83)
               at org.eclipse.cdt.ui.templateengine.Template.getTemplateWizardPages(Template.java:97)
               ????..



More information:
When I replace ?_? with ?-? i.e. PAGES-ONLY and not PAGES_ONLY it works. 

Another observation is that type like PAGES-TAB or PAGES-TREE even with ?-?gives the above error.

Created an attachment (id=81152)
patch applied to cdt_4_0

thanks, currently only PAGES-ONLY is implemented. I've updated the docs and tidied the code to reflect this.
applied to HEAD, marking as FIXED
